MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH15 and EH21 postcode areas of Edinburgh and Musselburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:59pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate third party damage to our underground cable network and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:03pm on Friday, 06 November 2020
